channel.title: Need Help With Equipping Requirements

item.title: Need Help With Equipping Requirements
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:248600"]Edit the wear method with something such as;

int CLMember = GetCLMember(wearID); if (playerIsMember - CLMember < 0) { Message("You need to be a member to equip this item."); return false; }

Usage;

public int GetCLMember(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 2; } return 1; }

Return it as 1 if it’s non-member, or if you want the item to be member’s only, return it as 2.[/quote]

Nope, I get no errors when running/compiling the server but u can still wield it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Equipping Requirements
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Edit the wear method with something such as;

int CLMember = GetCLMember(wearID); if (playerIsMember - CLMember < 0) { Message("You need to be a member to equip this item."); return false; }

Usage;

public int GetCLMember(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 2; } return 1; }

Return it as 1 if it’s non-member, or if you want the item to be member’s only, return it as 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Equipping Requirements
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

i have added all the voids and stuff for this, but when people equip the item they can although they arnt a member, How do i do it ??

this is my wearing code

public int GetCLMember(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 1; } return 1; }

Read full topic
